src: «Vi har nå 4 måneder gamle mus som har blitt kvitt son diabetes», la han til.
mt: “We now have 4-month-old mice that have been cured of diabetes,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor i medisin ved Dalhousie-universitet i Halifax, Nova Scotia og sjef ved den kliniske og vitenskapelige divisjonen av den kanadiske diabetesforeningen, advarte om at det er fortsatt foretatt lite forskning.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and head of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that little research has been done.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Han er, i likhet med andre eksperter, skeptisk til om diabetes kan kureres og påpeker at disse funnene ikke er relevant for mennesker som allerede har type 1 diabetes.
mt: He is, like other experts, skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured and points out that these findings are not relevant for people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Mandag kunne ikke Sara Danius, fast sekretær i Nobelkomiteen for litteratur hos det svenske akademiet, offentlig kunngjort under et radioprogram i Sverige, komme i kontakt med Bob Dylan om at han vant 2016s Nobelpris for litteratur, og hadde gitt opp å nå ham.
mt: 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature winner Bob Dylan was unreachable by Monday, when Sara Danius, secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, could not publicly announce the award to him, and had given up trying to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius forteller: «For tiden gjør vi ikke noe. Jeg har ringt og sendt e-post til hans nærmeste samarbeidspartner og mottok høflige svar. Det er mer enn nok for nå».
mt: Danius says: "For now we are doing nothing. I have called and emailed his closest partner and received polite responses. That is more than enough for now".
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Rings direktør, Jamie Siminoff, har uttalt fra før at firmaet begynte da ringeklokken hans ikke kunne bli hørt fra verkstedet i garasjen hans.
mt: Jamie Siminoff, the company's director, has previously stated that the company began when his doorbell could not be heard from his garage workshop.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Han laget en ringeklokke som er koblet til trådløst nett, fortalte han.
mt: He made a ring clock connected to a wireless network, he told.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Ifølge Siminoff økte salget etter han dukket opp i en Shark Tank-episode hvor serien takket nei til finansiering av oppstartsbedriften i 2013.
mt: According to Siminoff, sales increased after he appeared in a Shark Tank episode where the series turned down funding for the startup in 2013.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: I slutten av 2017 dukket Siminoff opp på QVC som er en TV-kanal for shopping.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on QVC, a TV channel for shopping.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring inngikk også forlik med et konkurrerende sikkerhetsselskap, ADT-konsernet.
mt: Ring also settled with a competing security company, ADT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Selv om en eksperimentell vaksine ser ut til å kunne redusere dødeligheten til Ebola, har ingen medisiner frem til å nå blitt klarert for å kunne behandle eksisterende infeksjon.
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to reduce the mortality rate of Ebola, no medications have yet been cleared to treat existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: ZMapp er en cocktail av antistoffer som i utgangspunktet var lovende i dette feltet, men formelle studier indikerte at den gav mindre gevinster enn hva man hadde håpet på i sitt arbeid for å forhindre død.
mt: ZMapp is a cocktail of antibodies that initially appeared promising in this field, but formal studies indicated that it gave less benefit than hoped in its work to prevent death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: I PALM-forsøket ble ZMapp benyttet som en kontroll, noe som betyr at forskere brukte det som hovedlinje og sammenlignet de tre andre behandlingene til det.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning researchers used it as the main line and compared the other three treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics støtter brevet fra den amerikanske OL-komiteen og er enige i at det er sårt nødvendig for OL-familien å kunne fremme et trygt miljø for alle utøverne sine.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee and agrees that it is so important for the Olympic family to be able to promote a safe environment for all its athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Vi er enige i USHs uttalelse om at interessene til våre utøvere og klubber og sporten deres, kan bli bedre tjent med å bevege seg fremover med en meningsfull endring innenfor vår organisasjon, i stedet for ny sertifisering.
mt: We agree with USH's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs and their sport can be better served by moving forward with a meaningful change within our organization, instead of new certification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics støtter en uavhengig gransking som kan sette lys på hvordan misbruk av proporsjoner som beskrives så tappert av at de overlevende etter Larry Nassar kunne ha gått uoppdaget i så lang tid og omfavner eventuelle nødvendige og aktuelle endringer.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent review that can shed light on how abuse of proportions described so carefully by the survivors after Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics og USOC har samme mål — det å gjøre idrett og annen sport så trygt som mulig for utøvere, slik at de kan følge drømmene sine i et miljø som er trygt, sterkt og positivt.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC share the same goal — to make sport and other sports as safe as possible for athletes, so they can pursue their dreams in an environment that is safe, strong and positive.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Brzezinski jobbet for John F. Kennedy gjennom 1960-årene som rådgiveren hans og deretter for administrasjonen til Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy in the 1960s as his advisor and then for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Han gav Carter råd om utenrikspolitikk under 1976-valget, deretter jobbet han som nasjonal sikkerhetsrådgiver (NSA) fra 1977 til 1981, etter Henry Kissinger.
mt: He advised Carter on foreign policy during the 1976 election, then worked as a national security advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Da han var NSA assisterte han Carter med diplomatisk behandling av globale saker som Camp David-avtalen i 1978; normalisering av relasjonen mellom USA og Kina gjennom avslutningen på 1970-tallet; revolusjonen i Iran som forårsaket den iranske gisselkrisen i 1979; og den sovjetiske invasjonen i Afghanistan i 1979.
mt: As an NSA assistant, he helped Carter with diplomatic handling of global issues such as the Camp David Accords in 1978; normalization of relations between the United States and China through the end of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution which caused the Iranian hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filmen, der Ryan Gosling og Emma Stone har roller, ble nominert i alle hovedkategorier.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling og Stone ble nominert i kategoriene henholdsvis beste mannlige og kvinnelig skuespiller.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated in the categories of best actor and actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: De andre nominasjonene omfatter beste film, regi, filmproduksjon, kostymedesign, klipping, filmmusikk, produksjonsdesign, lydredigering, lydmiks og originalmanus.
mt: Other nominations include best picture, director, film editing, cinematography, costume design, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: De to sangene, The Fools Who Dream og City of Stars, som er hentet fra filmen Audition, ble nominert som beste originalsang. Lionsgate-studio mottok 26 nominasjoner – som er mer enn noe annet studio.
mt: The two songs, The Fools Who Dream and City of Stars, which are taken from the film La La Land, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations – more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Sent på søndag meddelte USAs president Donald Trump, i en uttalelse levert via hans pressesekretær, at de amerikanske troppene nå skulle forlate Syria.
mt: On Sunday, US President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered through his press secretary, announced that American troops would now be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Meddelelsen kom etter at Trump hadde hatt en telefonsamtale med den tyrkiske presidenten Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Tyrkia ville også ta over bevoktningen av fangede IS-krigere som, ifølge uttalelsen, europeiske nasjoner har nektet å ta tilbake.
mt: Turkey also wanted to take over the protection of captured IS fighters, according to the statement, which European nations have refused to take back.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Dette bekrefter ikke bare at enkelte dinosaurer hadde fjær, en teori som allerede er populær, men viser detaljer som fossiler som regel ikke har mulighet til å vise, som f.eks. farger og tredimensjonal ordning.
mt: This not only confirms that some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that is already popular, but shows details that fossils usually cannot show, such as colors and three-dimensional ordering.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Forskere sier at fjærdrakten til dette dyret var kastanjebrun på toppen med en blek eller en karotenoid farge på undersiden.
mt: . Researchers say the feathered coat of this animal was chestnut brown on top with a pale or carotenoid color on the underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Oppdagelsen gir i tillegg innsikt i utviklingen for fjær hos fugler.
mt: The discovery also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Fordi dinosaurfjærene ikke har en velutviklet sjakt som kalles for rachis, men har andre funksjoner for fjærer – mothaker og hylster – antok forskerne at rachis trolig var en senere evolusjonær utvikling slik som de andre relevante funksjonene.
mt: Because dinosaur feathers did not have a well-developed shaft called the rachis, but had other functions for feathers – mothaker and hylster – researchers assumed that rachis was a later evolutionary development like the other relevant functions.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Fjærens struktur tyder på at de ikke ble brukt til å fly, men heller for temperaturregulering eller utseende. Forskerne foreslo at, selv om dette er halen til en ung dinosaur, viser eksempelprøven voksen fjærdrakt og ikke kyllingsdun.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or appearance. Researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the example shows adult feathering and not downy plumage.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Forskerne antydet at, selv om dette var halen til en dinosaur, viste prøven fjærdrakten til en voksen og ikke en kyllings dun.
mt: Researchers suggested that, even though this was the tail of a dinosaur, the sample showed the feathers of an adult, not a chick.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: I går formiddag gikk en bilbombe av ved politihovedkvarteret i Gaziantep i Tyrkia i går formiddag. To politibetjenter ble drept og mer enn 20 andre mennesker ble skadet.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and more than 20 other people were injured when a car bomb exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, yesterday morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: I følge sysselmannens kontor var nitten av de skadde politibetjenter.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Politiet fortalte de mistenker at en påstått Daesh-kriger (ISIL) var ansvarlig for angrepet.
mt: Police told they suspected a self-proclaimed Daesh fighter (ISIL) was responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: De fant ut at solen fungerte på de samme grunnprinsippene som andre stjerner: Aktiviteten til alle stjerner i systemet viste seg å kun være drevet av sin lysstyrke og rotasjon.
mt: They found that the sun worked on the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven only by its brightness and rotation.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Lysstyrken og rotasjonen brukes sammen for å fastslå en stjernes Rossbytall som er knyttet til væskestrøm.
mt: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to the fluid flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Desto lavere Rossbytallet er, desto mindre aktiv er stjernen når det gjelder magnetiske reverseringer.
mt: The lower the Rossby number is, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: I løpet av reisen sin kom Iwasaki i trøbbel ved flere begivenheter.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki encountered several incidents.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Han ble ranet av pirater, angrepet i Tibet av en rabiat hund, rømte fra et ekteskap i Nepal og pågrepet i India.
mt: He was attacked by pirates, mauled by a rabid dog in Tibet, fled a marriage in Nepal and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n-standarden driver på frekvensene 2.4Ghz og 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n standard operates on the frequencies 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Dette vil lage mulighet for kompatibilitet bakover med 802.11a, 802.11b og 802.11g, dersom basestasjonen har doble radioer.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g compatibility will be possible if the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Hastigheten til 802.11n er betydelig raskere enn forgjengerne som har en teoretisk gjennomstrømning på maksimalt 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n's speed is significantly faster than its predecessors, which have a theoretical throughput of up to 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, som er gift og har 2 voksne barn, hadde liten innvirkning på Miller, som historien var relatert til.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, had little impact on Miller, who the story was related to.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Da han ble spurt om å kommentere, fortalte Miller: «Mike prater mye under høringen ... Jeg forberedte meg, så jeg hørte egentlig ikke etter på det han sa».
mt: When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I prepared myself, so I really didn't listen to what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: «Vi vil strebe mot å kutte karbondioksidutslipp per enhet BNP av en nobelmargin innen 2020 fra 2005-nivå», sa Hu.
mt: «We will strive to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a noble margin by 2020 from the 2005 level», Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Han satte ikke tall for kuttene, og sa at disse ville bli foretatt basert på Kinas økonomiske produksjon.
mt: He did not give figures for the cuts, and said they would be made based on China's economic production.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu oppfordret til å utvikle land «for å unngå å forbli på den gamle stien med forurensning først og rengjøring etterpå».
mt: Hu urged the country to develop in a way that «avoids remaining on the old path of pollution first and cleaning up afterwards».
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Han la til at «de uansett ikke bør bli bedt om å ta på seg forpliktelser som går utover deres utviklingsfase, ansvar og muligheter».
mt: He added that "they should not be asked to take on responsibilities that go beyond their developmental stage, accountability and opportunities".
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Den irakiske studiegruppen presenterte rapporten sin klokken 12.00 GMT i dag.
mt: The Iraqi study group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Det gir et varsel om at ingen kan garantere at noe tiltak som gjennomføres i Irak på dette punktet vil stoppe sekterisk krigføring, økende vold eller kaos.
mt: It warns that no action taken in Iraq at this point can be guaranteed to stop sectarian warfare, increasing violence or chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Rapporten åpner med åpen debatt rundt straffesak og dannelse av konsensus i USA angående politikken mot Midtøsten.
mt: The report opens with open debate around the criminal case and the formation of consensus in the United States regarding policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Rapporten er meget skeptisk til de fleste aspekter av den gjeldende politikken til utøvende myndighet overfor Irak, og oppmuntrer til momentant forandring av retning.
mt: The report is very skeptical of most aspects of the current policy of the executive branch towards Iraq, and encourages an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Først blant sine 78 anbefalinger er at et nytt diplomatisk initiativ skal tas før slutten av året for å sikre Iraks grenser mot fiendtlige intervensjoner og for å gjenetablere diplomatiske forhold til sine naboer.
mt: 1st of its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative be taken before the end of the year to ensure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Den nåværende senatoren og argentinske førstedamen Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner kunngjorde presidentkandidaturet sitt i går kveld i byen La Plata, som ligger 50 km (31 miles) fra Buenos Aires.
mt: The current senator and Argentine first lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in the city of La Plata, which lies 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Fru Kirchner kunngjorde at hun ønsket å stille til valg som president på Argentinas teater, samme sted som hun brukte til å starte sin 2005-kampanje for Senatet som medlem av delegasjonen fra Buenos Aires-provinsen.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced that she wanted to run for president on Argentina's stage, the same place she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Diskusjonen ble satt i gang av uenighet om utgifter til hjelp og gjenoppbygging etter orkanen Katrina; noe som noen skattemessig konservative humoristisk har omtalt som «Bushs New Orleans-avtale».
mt: The discussion was started by disagreement over spending on aid and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina; something which some tax-cutting conservative humorist has described as "Bush's New Orleans deal".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: For å kunne bevare Washington-innsidere har liberal kritikk av rekonstruksjonstrevet vært fokusert på utarbeidelse av rekonstruksjonskontrakter.
mt: To preserve Washington insiders, liberal criticism of the reconstruction contract has focused on the development of reconstruction contracts.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Det var mer enn fire millioner folk som reiste til Roma for å være med på gravleggingen.
mt: 4 million people traveled to Rome to be part of the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Det var så mange mennesker til stede at det var umulig for alle å få plass ved begravelsen på Petersplassen.
mt: There were so many people present that it was impossible for all to find a place at the funeral on Peters Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Flere store tv-skjermer ble installert på ulike områder i Roma slik at folket kunne se seremonien.
mt: Large TV screens were installed in various areas of Rome so that the people could see the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Tilsvarende oppstillinger ble laget og vist til et stort antall mennesker i mange andre byer i Italia og i resten av verden, særlig i Polen.
mt: Similar displays were made and shown to a large number of people in many other cities in Italy and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historikere har kritisert tidligere FBI-politikk for å forsøke å øke byråets suksessrate med å benytte mer ressurser på saker som løses enkelt, særlig stjelte kjøretøy.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's previous policy of trying to increase its success rate by using more resources on cases that are easily solved, especially stolen vehicles.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongressen startet finansieringen av obskønitetsinitiativet i regnskapsåret 2005, de spesifiserte da at FBI måtte vie 10 agenter til voksenpornografi.
mt: 2005, Congress started funding the obscenity initiative, they specified then that the FBI had to devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa fikk omgangens høyeste poengsum, 70 poeng på bare 41 slag. Han fikk elleve ganger fire poeng , og to ganger seks poeng.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score of the match, 70 runs off 41 balls. He scored eleven fours and two sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Mellomordens flaggermus, Sachin Tendulkar og Rahul Dravid, gjennomførte godt og inngikk et partnerskap på hundre løp.
mt: The bat of the Middle East, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and entered into a partnership of a hundred runs.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Etter å ha mistet kapteinens wicket klarte India bare 36 løp og tapte 7 wicketer på slutten av omgangene.
mt: 36 runs after losing the captain's wicket, India lost 7 wickets at the end of the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: USAs president George W. Bush kom til Singapore om morgenen den 16. november som innledningen til en ukes rundtur i Asia.
mt: 16 November 2005: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore this morning as the start of a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Han ble tatt i mot av visestatsministeren i Singapore, Wong Kan Seng, og har diskutert handels- og terrorsaker med statsministeren i Singapore, Lee Heggen Loong.
mt: He was received by the Deputy Prime Minister of Singapore, Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terror issues with the Prime Minister of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Etter en uke med tap i midterm-valget, fortalte Bush et publikum om utbyggelsen av handel i Asia.
mt: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Statsminister Stephen Harper har gått med på å sende regjeringens «Ren luft-forslag» for gjennomgang i en allpartikomité før sitt andre vurdering etter tirsdagens 25 minutters møte med NDP-leder Jack Layton ved statsministerkontoret.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Bill" to a multi-party committee for review before its second reading after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the Prime Minister's Office on Tuesday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton hadde etterspurt forandringer i de konservatives forslag til miljølov under møtet med statsministeren, og spurte om en «grundig og komplett omskrivning» av det konservative partiets forslag til miljølov.
mt: Layton had sought changes to the Conservatives' proposed environmental legislation during the meeting with the prime minister, and asked for a "thorough and complete re-write" of the Conservative Party's proposed environmental legislation.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Helt siden den føderale regjeringen tok over finansiering av Mersey-sykehuset i Devonhavn, Tasmania, har statlige myndigheter og noen føderale MP-er kritisert denne handlingen som et stunt i forløpet til det føderale valget som skal gjennomføres i november.
mt: Since the federal government took over funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, state authorities and some federal MPs have criticised this action as a stunt in the lead-up to the federal election to be held in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Men statsminister John Howard har sagt at loven bare var for å sikre sykehusfasilitene mot å bli nedgradert av tasmanske myndigheter, ved å gi ekstra AUDkr 45 millioner.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the law was only to ensure hospital facilities were not downgraded by Tasmanian authorities, by providing an extra AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Ifølge den siste rapporten viste havnivåmålinger at en tsunami ble generert. En del tydelig tsunamiaktivitet ble registrert i nærheten av Pago Pago og Niue.
mt: According to the latest report, harbor gauge readings showed a tsunami was generated. Some significant tsunami activity was recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Ingen store skader eller ødeleggelser er rapportert i Tonga, men strømmen var midlertidig borte, noe som visstnok forhindret Tonganske myndigheter i å motta tsunamivarselet, som ble sendt ut av PTWC.
mt: No major damage or destruction has been reported in Tonga, but the power was temporarily out, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning, which was issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: 14 skoler i Hawaii lokalisert på eller i nærheten av kystlinjer ble stengt hele onsdag til tross for at advarslene ikke lenger var gjeldende.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all Wednesday despite the warnings no longer being in effect.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Presidenten i USA, George W. Bush, ønsket kunngjøringen velkommen.
mt: President of the United States, George W. Bush, welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bush sin talsmann, Gordon Johndroe, kalte Nord-Koreas løfte «et svært skritt på veien til målet om å oppnå verifiserbart denuklarering av den koreanske halvøya».
mt: Bush's spokesman, Gordon Johndroe, called North Korea's pledge "a very important step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Den subtropiske stormen Jerry, formet seg i Atlanterhavet i dag og er den 10. navngitte stormen i den atlantiske orkansesongen.
mt: Subtropical storm Jerry formed in the Atlantic Ocean today and is the tenth named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Ifølge NHC (National Hurricane Center) er ikke Jerry lenger noen trussel mot land.
mt: According to NHC (National Hurricane Center) Jerry is no longer a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: USAs ingeniørkorps har anslått at 6 tommer kan bryte de allerede ødelagte dikene.
mt: 6 inches can break the already broken dikes.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Den niende avdelingen, som så oversvømmelse så høy som 20 britiske fot under orkanen Katrina, befinner seg for øyeblikket i vann opp til hoftehøyde ettersom den nærliggende dalen har blitt overflommet.
mt: 9th Army Division, which saw flooding as high as 20 British feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in water up to waist height as the nearby valley has been overflommed.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Vann renner over vollen i en seksjon som er 100 britiske fot bred.
mt: 100 feet of the dam is overtopped by water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Commons-administrator Adam Cuerden var irritabel på grunn av slettingene når han pratet med Wikinews for en måned siden.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden was irritable about the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews a month ago.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: «Han [Wales] var i utgangspunktet uærlig med oss fra begynnelsen. Først i atferden sin, som om dette var av juridiske årsaker. For det andre, ved å gi inntrykk av at han hørte på oss, rett opp til slettingen av kunsten sin.»
mt: «He [Wales] was initially dishonest with us from the beginning. First in his behavior, as if this was for legal reasons. Secondly, by giving the impression that he was listening to us, right up to the destruction of his art.»
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Irritasjon fra allmennheten førte til gjeldende innsats med å utarbeide en nettsidepolicy med hensyn til seksuelt innhold. Nettstedet er vert for millioner av åpent-lisensierte medier.
mt: Irritation from the public led to the current effort to draft a website policy regarding sexual content. The site hosts millions of open-licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Jobben som ble foretatt var mest teoretisk, men programmet ble skrevet for å simulere observasjoner fra Skytten-galaksen.
mt: The job was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations from the Skytten galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Effekten som teamet var på jakt etter, ville forårsakes av tidevannskrefter mellom galaksens og melkeveiens mørke materie.
mt: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's and the Milky Way's dark matter.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Akkurat som månen påvirker tyngdekraften på jorden, og dermed forårsaker tidevann, påvirker Melkeveien Skytten-galaksen med sine krefter.
mt: Just as the moon affects gravity on Earth, and thus causes tides, the Milky Way Skytten-galaxy affects it with its forces.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Forskerne kom til konklusjonen om at den mørke materien virker inn på annet mørkt materie på helt lik måte som vanlig materie gjør.
mt: Researchers concluded that dark matter behaves in the same way as ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Denne teorien mener at det aller meste av den mørke materien rundt en galakse befinner seg rundt galaksen i en slags glorie, og er laget av mange små partikler.
mt: This theory posits that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is around the galaxy in a sort of glory, and is made of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: TV-nyheter viser at det kommer hvit røyk fra anlegget.
mt: TV news shows white smoke coming from the facility.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Beboere nær anlegget blir anbefalt av lokale myndigheter om å holde seg inne, ikke ha på klimaanlegget og ikke drikke vann fra kranen.
mt: Residents near the facility are advised by local authorities to stay indoors, not use air conditioning and not drink water from the tap.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Ifølge Japans atombyrå, er radioaktivt vesium og jod blitt identifisert ved anlegget.
mt: According to Japan's atomic agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Myndighetene spekulerer i om det er et tegn på at beholdere med urandrivstoff på stedet, kan ha sprukket og gått lekk.
mt: Authorities speculate that it may be a sign that the fuel tanks on the site, may have ruptured and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll kom over tuberkulosen (XDR-TB) som var særdeles motstandsdyktig mot medisin i den sørafrikanske regionen KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll contracted the extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) that was highly resistant to medicine in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Han sa i et intervju, at den nye varianten var «svært urovekkende og alarmerende på grunn av den svært høye dødeligheten».
mt: He said in an interview that the new variant was "very alarming and alarming because of the very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dr. Moll tror at noen av pasientene kan ha blitt smittet av bakterien på sykehuset og minst to av dem var helsearbeidere.
mt: Dr. Moll believes some of the patients may have been infected at the hospital and at least two of them were health care workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
